fields.name: AssignedTo
fields.description: The name of the user the incident is assigned to.

fields.name: Email
fields.description: The email of the user the incident is assigned to.

fields.name: ObjectId
fields.description: The object id of the user the incident is assigned to.

fields.description: The type of the owner the incident is assigned to.

fields.name: UserPrincipalName
fields.description: The user principal name of the user the incident is assigned to.
